text: Dmitry Balmin (born July 15, 1970) is a retired Russian ice hockey defender. He played 16 seasons in Ak Bars (Itil, SK imeni Uritskovo). He played nearly 900 games for Tatarstanian teams. Balmin was Russian champion in 1998.
